message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $100 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $95, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $92.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $88 for the product.
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $91.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $87 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $90.
Alice, I appreciate your time and effort, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to pay more than $87 for the product. This is my final offer.
